text: Love this restaurant!  It is my go-to when I want Asian food. The staff is warm and welcoming and the food is consistently great. If you have not given it a try, do!  We need to keep this little gem in our neighbourhood!

Great variety of different cuisines decently priced! Every dish is big enough for at least two meals and everything is quite tasty. They have a dedicated waiting area for ordering and takeout which makes it separate from the restaurant creating a great balance for dining in or grabbing food to go. Love the pad thai!

Done takeout Chinese food here a few times.  Food quality is good, not great.  Maybe too many things on the menu, they can't be great at everything.  On a positive note, they are always quite fast with takeout orders (15 mins or so) and staff seem pleasant.
